articles.title: Sam Bennett retains lead in Vuelta a San Juan after third place finish
articles.description: American rider Quinn Simmons wins stage three in Argentina
articles.content:
Sam Bennett finished third on stage three of the Vuelta a San Juan in Argentina late on Tuesday evening, retaining the race leader’s jersey but coming up just short of a stage win.
American rider Quinn Simmons (Trek-Segafredo) launched a solo move in... [1946 chars]

articles.title: GRAINS-Soybeans tick higher, Argentine weather limits gains; wheat firm
articles.description: SINGAPORE, Jan 25 (Reuters) - Chicago soybean futures rose for the first time in six sessions on Wednesday, although beneficial rains across Argentina's crop belt limited the upside potential in prices.Wheat and corn prices rose for a second session.FUNDAMENTALS* The most-active soybean contract on the Chicago Board of Trade rose 0.1% to $14.90 a bushel, as of 0155 GMT.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE, Jan 25 (Reuters) - Chicago soybean futures rose for the first time in six sessions on Wednesday, although beneficial rains across Argentina's crop belt limited the upside potential in prices.
Wheat and corn prices rose for a second session... [1377 chars]

articles.title: Argentina pumps record monthly shale oil output as Vaca Muerta ramps up
articles.description: Argentina's shale oil production reached a new monthly record in December, the energy ministry said on Tuesday, fueled by continued development of the huge Vaca Muerta shale formation
articles.content:
Argentina's shale oil production reached a new monthly record in December, the energy ministry said on Tuesday, fueled by continued development of the huge Vaca Muerta shale formation.
The country pumped an average of 282.4K bbl/day of shale oil last... [791 chars]

articles.title: Grupo iZen, Non Stop Launch New Production Company Cacao & Cia
articles.description: Spain’s Grupo iZen and Argentina-based Non Stop have launched Cacao & Cia to produce content for the global Spanish-speaking market.
articles.content:
Spain’s Grupo iZen and Argentina-based Non Stop have launched Cacao & Cia, a new shingle aimed at producing content for the global Spanish-speaking market.
With offices in Madrid and Mexico, the joint venture will be headed by Non Stop’s Pedro Dávila... [2444 chars]

articles.title: Argentina rains surpass forecasts, but showers uneven -grains exchange
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Jan 24 (Reuters) - Recent rains in Argentina surpassed the "most optimistic" forecasts, the Rosario grains exchange said on Tuesday, a boost for grains farmers in the country hit by drought, though rainfall was unevenly spread and more is needed.Argentina, the world's top exporter of processed soy and No.

articles.title: Brazil wheat making strides in global markets amid Russia-Ukraine conflict
articles.description: By Nayara FigueiredoSAO PAULO, Jan 24 (Reuters) - Brazil is poised to register record wheat shipments for January as local suppliers continue to fill the void left by major exporters Russia and Ukraine because of the ongoing war, industry sources told Reuters.The combination of a bumper harvest and production hiccups in Argentina due to a drought also bolstered Brazilian

articles.title: CBOT corn futures firm on bargain buying, Argentina rain impact
articles.description: CHICAGO, Jan 24 (Reuters) - Chicago Board of Trade corn futures firmed on Tuesday, as feed users tried to snap up bargains and investors assessed how much benefit the rainfall may have helped drought pressures in Argentina, traders said.* CBOT March corn settled up 10-3/4 cents at $6.77 per bushel. In the previous session, the contract dipped to the lowest price since Jan.
